name: slv-utils
description: Utilities for working with SLV and DAT files.

scripts.test: npm run generate&& node test/build.js && mocha test/slv.js test/index.js
scripts.generate: pegjs -o src/parsers/slv-raw-parser.js src/parsers/pegjs/slv-raw.pegjs && pegjs -o src/parsers/slv-value-parser.js src/parsers/pegjs/slv-value.pegjs && pegjs -o src/parsers/dat-parser.js src/parsers/pegjs/dat.pegjs && pegjs -o src/parsers/rct-parser.js src/parsers/pegjs/rct.pegjs

author: Evgeny Metelkin
